packages/file_input/packages/file_input_view/include/plugins/swfupload.queue.js

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002       Queue Plug-in
00003       
00004       Features:
00005             *Adds a cancelQueue() method for cancelling the entire queue.
00006             *All queued files are uploaded when startUpload() is called.
00007             *If false is returned from uploadComplete then the queue upload is stopped.
00008              If false is not returned (strict comparison) then the queue upload is continued.
00009             *Adds a QueueComplete event that is fired when all the queued files have finished uploading.
00010              Set the event handler with the queue_complete_handler setting.
00011             
00012       */
00013 
00014 var SWFUpload;
00015 if (typeof(SWFUpload) === "function") {
00016       SWFUpload.queue = {};
00017       
00018       SWFUpload.prototype.initSettings = (function (oldInitSettings) {
00019             return function () {
00020                   if (typeof(oldInitSettings) === "function") {
00021                         oldInitSettings.call(this);
00022                   }
00023                   
00024                   this.queueSettings = {};
00025                   
00026                   this.queueSettings.queue_cancelled_flag = false;
00027                   this.queueSettings.queue_upload_count = 0;
00028                   
00029                   this.queueSettings.user_upload_complete_handler = this.settings.upload_complete_handler;
00030                   this.queueSettings.user_upload_start_handler = this.settings.upload_start_handler;
00031                   this.settings.upload_complete_handler = SWFUpload.queue.uploadCompleteHandler;
00032                   this.settings.upload_start_handler = SWFUpload.queue.uploadStartHandler;
00033                   
00034                   this.settings.queue_complete_handler = this.settings.queue_complete_handler || null;
00035             };
00036       })(SWFUpload.prototype.initSettings);
00037 
00038       SWFUpload.prototype.startUpload = function (fileID) {
00039             this.queueSettings.queue_cancelled_flag = false;
00040             this.callFlash("StartUpload", [fileID]);
00041       };
00042 
00043       SWFUpload.prototype.cancelQueue = function () {
00044             this.queueSettings.queue_cancelled_flag = true;
00045             this.stopUpload();
00046             
00047             var stats = this.getStats();
00048             while (stats.files_queued > 0) {
00049                   this.cancelUpload();
00050                   stats = this.getStats();
00051             }
00052       };
00053       
00054       SWFUpload.queue.uploadStartHandler = function (file) {
00055             var returnValue;
00056             if (typeof(this.queueSettings.user_upload_start_handler) === "function") {
00057                   returnValue = this.queueSettings.user_upload_start_handler.call(this, file);
00058             }
00059             
00060             // To prevent upload a real "FALSE" value must be returned, otherwise default to a real "TRUE" value.
00061             returnValue = (returnValue === false) ? false : true;
00062             
00063             this.queueSettings.queue_cancelled_flag = !returnValue;
00064 
00065             return returnValue;
00066       };
00067       
00068       SWFUpload.queue.uploadCompleteHandler = function (file) {
00069             var user_upload_complete_handler = this.queueSettings.user_upload_complete_handler;
00070             var continueUpload;
00071             
00072             if (file.filestatus === SWFUpload.FILE_STATUS.COMPLETE) {
00073                   this.queueSettings.queue_upload_count++;
00074             }
00075 
00076             if (typeof(user_upload_complete_handler) === "function") {
00077                   continueUpload = (user_upload_complete_handler.call(this, file) === false) ? false : true;
00078             } else if (file.filestatus === SWFUpload.FILE_STATUS.QUEUED) {
00079                   // If the file was stopped and re-queued don't restart the upload
00080                   continueUpload = false;
00081             } else {
00082                   continueUpload = true;
00083             }
00084             
00085             if (continueUpload) {
00086                   var stats = this.getStats();
00087                   if (stats.files_queued > 0 && this.queueSettings.queue_cancelled_flag === false) {
00088                         this.startUpload();
00089                   } else if (this.queueSettings.queue_cancelled_flag === false) {
00090                         this.queueEvent("queue_complete_handler", [this.queueSettings.queue_upload_count]);
00091                         this.queueSettings.queue_upload_count = 0;
00092                   } else {
00093                         this.queueSettings.queue_cancelled_flag = false;
00094                         this.queueSettings.queue_upload_count = 0;
00095                   }
00096             }
00097       };
00098 }
